attribute.description: The identifier for this component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: The rendered indicator for this component.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Panel for map control.
attribute.name: mapPanel

attribute.description: Map background layer. Valid values are "streets", "satellite", "hybrid", "topo", "oceans", "gray", "national-geographic", and "osm".
attribute.name: background

attribute.description: Map latitude coordinate. Defaults to "39.828175".
attribute.name: latitude

attribute.description: Map longitude coordinate. Defaults to "-98.5795".
attribute.name: longitude

attribute.description: Map zoom level. Most ESRI background layers range from 0 to 16 or 19. Defaults to "4".
attribute.name: zoom

attribute.description: Map maximum levels of detail (LODS). Most ESRI background layers range from 0 to 16 or 19. Lower/higher values restrict/add zoom levels available.
attribute.name: lods

attribute.description: Scalebar control visibility. Valid values are "true" and "false". Defaults to "true".
attribute.name: showScalebar

attribute.description: Logo visibility. Valid values are "true" and "false". Defaults to "false".
attribute.name: showLogo

attribute.description: Layer attribution text visibility. Valid values are "true" and "false". Defaults to "false".
attribute.name: showAttribution

attribute.description: Panel for legend control.
attribute.name: legendPanel

attribute.description: Panel for overview control.
attribute.name: overviewPanel

attribute.description: Panel for geocoder control.
attribute.name: geocoderPanel

attribute.description: Panel for latitude/longitude coordinates display.
attribute.name: coordinatesPanel

attribute.description: Panel shown while map is loading or updating.
attribute.name: loadingPanel

attribute.description: Panel for map navigation tools.
attribute.name: navigationPanel

attribute.description: The identifier for this component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Service type. Valid values are "tiled", "image", "dynamic", "kml", "feature", and "graphics".
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Service URL. Required for "tiled", "image", "dynamic", "kml", and "feature" services. ESRI layers may be found at http://www.arcgis.com.
attribute.name: url

attribute.description: Service visibility. Valid values are "true" and "false".
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: Service opacity. Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0, inclusive. The legend widget honors the service's opacity value.
attribute.name: opacity

attribute.description: Map service refresh interval in minutes. Defaults to "0".
attribute.name: refreshInterval

attribute.description: Map service minimum visible scale. If the map is zoomed out beyond this scale, the layer will not be visible. Defaults to "0", which means no minimum scale.
attribute.name: minScale

attribute.description: Map service maximum visible scale. If the map is zoomed in beyond this scale, the layer will not be visible. Defaults to "0", which means no maximum scale.
attribute.name: maxScale

attribute.description: Graphics model. Required if the service type is "graphics".
attribute.name: model

attribute.description: The identifier for this component.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Layer number.
attribute.name: number

attribute.description: Layer visibility. Valid values are "true" and "false".
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: Layer definition expression.
attribute.name: where
